page.title: 06Carnival & Fete
page.content: "Dorridge Day"is an annual event held in the local park for the villagers to have a 'fun day' as well as to raise money for selected charities.The {entertainment}for the day consists of {amusements, exhibitions,}stalls and {competitions}in which everyone takes part. Children are entertained by clowns, scramble bikes and an inflatable bouncy castle while adults are involved with steam engines,hot air balloon and police displays. Money is raised from stalls ranging from white elephant to farm produce and from competitions as diverse as fancy dress and 'haggis hurling'. "Dorridge Day"is opened by the Mayor of Solihull and is a day everyone looks forward to.
